## \_find() function

Find an object in an array of objects

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function _find<T>(array: Maybe<ImmutableArray<T>>, value: unknown, identifier: Prop<Immutable<T>>): Maybe<Immutable<T>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | Maybe&lt;ImmutableArray&lt;T&gt;&gt; | An array of objects |
|  value | unknown | A unique value used to find the object |
|  identifier | Prop&lt;Immutable&lt;T&gt;&gt; | A property on the object that contains the unique value |

<b>Returns:</b>

Maybe&lt;Immutable&lt;T&gt;&gt;
